item.title: Mattress Fly Tipped, 2nd October
item.description:
A rolled up and sellotaped mattress has been dumped on Beckenham Grove and has been there for the past two days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Bromley Grove, Shortlands, London

item.title: Flying tipping, 2nd October
item.description:
More flying tipping on a regular basis on this site in Ilderton Road . Very visible from platform on South Bermondsey Station . I think the site is private owned. Concern with it being set on fire . The site is past the traveller site and the tyre place on Ilderton Rd SE16.

Report on FixMyStreet
